About me

Who Am I

Hello! My name is Yurii. I am interested in the IT-industry, namely, I am developing in the field of manual and automated testing (QA/AQA). Successfully completed several courses on Manual QA, web development, worked with teachers, mentors. He studied at the IT-school ProgKiev.ua on the "QA-Start" course and on the educational online platform Udemy - there are specialized certificates. While studying at the GoIt IT-school on the courses: Front-End and Manual QA Engineer, he participated in the development of web projects, and was also the Team Lead of the intern-QA and intern-mobile-QA groups for testing a real project - an online store: "BigMag". Developed teamwork skills in Scrum. I have some experience with crowdfunding platforms: uTest and Test.io. At the moment I'm doing more web/mobile and desktop testingI am engaged in self-development, improving my skills in courses, trainings. I would be happy to consider various options for remote cooperation in this area (both long term and short term) full time or part time.

"Git: a complete course for beginners and more, 2021"

Mentor: Наиль Алишев | 2021

GIT is the most essential developer tool. Whether you're working for a large company, an ambitious startup, or working with a friend on a personal project, having a strong knowledge of GIT is sure to come in handy. GIT is perhaps the only tool that is so widely used in the software development industry around the world. And this is understandable, because wherever teamwork is required on a single project, GIT is the gold standard.

This course is suitable for those people who do not know anything about GIT and would like to learn it from scratch. However, the course will also be useful for those people who use GIT on a daily basis in their work, but would like to gain more confidence in managing this tool. Often, developers who use GIT on a daily basis do not have a deep understanding of how this version control system works. Therefore, in this course, all aspects of the GIT device are understood in the most thorough and detailed way.
